alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:42AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Telfair, southeastern Treutlen, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1242 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Barnhill to near McRae, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Lumber City, Glenwood, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Tarrytown, Towns, Spring Hill, Landsburg, Kibbee and Jordan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
